Action.welcome.1: Welcome to Color Chat! We'll be talking about colors. What is your favorite?
Action.welcome.2: Good to have you back at Color Chat.
Action.welcome: This is your {{ordinalize User.State.NumVisits}} visit to Color Chat.

Text: Wow! This is your {{ordinalize User.State.NumVisits}} visit to Color Chat.

Action.unknown.1: I'm sorry, I didn't get that.
Can you repeat that? I didn't understand.
Action.unknown.2: I'm sorry, but we were talking about colors, and I'm not sure I understand.
I didn't hear a color there. Can you try that again please.
Action.unknown: I still didn't hear anything. Perhaps another time.
I didn't hear a color. Hope you come back to play later.
Action.repeat: Sorry about that, let me try again.
Action.quit: Thanks for visiting! Hope to see you again.
Hope you had fun. Let's do this again sometime.
That was great. Don't be a stranger!
Action.color: {{color}} is one of my favorite colors as well.
Oh yes, {{color}} can be quite striking.
I can certainly understand why you like {{color}}.

Text: I don't know, I agree with you that {{favoriteColor}}

Outent.color.blue: I think there is something so striking about {{color}}.

Default: What other color are you thinking about?

Template.Text: I seem to be a little confused.
